snippet: The family of a man who died after being stunned up to 13 times with Taser devices during his arrest settled a lawsuit against East Point, an Atlanta suburb, and two police officers.
abstract: Family of Gregory L Towns Jr, man who died after being stunned up to 13 times with Taser devices during arrest, settles lawsuit against East Point, a suburb of Atlanta, and two police officers.
lead_paragraph: The family of a man who died after being stunned up to 13 times with Taser devices during his arrest settled a lawsuit against East Point, an Atlanta suburb, and two police officers.

headline.main: Georgia: Lawsuit Over Taser Death Is Settled
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Lawsuit Over Taser Death Is Settled
